infotexts.afflictiondescription.cat: Subject grows cat ears and tail and can bite. Moves faster on land.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.wolf: Subject grows the ears and tail of a wolf and can bite. Can withstand more damage.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.fox: Subject grows fox ears and tail and can bite. Deals more melee damage.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.dog: Subject grows the ears and tail of a dog and can bite. Swims faster.
infotexts.entitydescription.geneticmaterialcat: The owner grows cat ears and tail and can bite. Increases land movement speed by [value]%.
infotexts.entitydescription.geneticmaterialfox: The owner grows fox ears and tail and can bite. Increases melee damage by [value]%.
infotexts.entitydescription.geneticmaterialdog: The owner grows the dog's ears and tail and can bite. Increases movement speed in water by [value]%.
infotexts.entitydescription.geneticmaterialwolf: The wearer grows the ears and tail of a wolf and can bite. Increases damage resistance by [value]%.
infotexts.entitydescription.unidentifiedanimalgene: A mass of genetic material from the Earth. The research station will allow you to determine its identity and transform it into a form suitable for a gene splicer.
